No more scrolling up to the address bar to click ‘refresh’ every few seconds! FAQs

Go to your browser and open the extension store, type in the name of the extension you are looking for, which in this case is “Tabs Reloader”, and then install the extension.

Tabs Reloader is an extension that is easy to use; it can be accessed by clicking the icon in your browser’s toolbar, and then you can decide to reload the tab that is currently open or all the tabs, or tabs on the left or right.
